      • getInstance

        public static SECMDocumentBuilder getInstance(Context context)

      • prepareEditing

        public void prepareEditing(int index)
        Prepare the document for editing a image in the document. This method should be call before perform any edit operation.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the image in the document to edit

      • cancelEditing

        public void cancelEditing()
        Cancel the edit operation. Restore the image to the last saved state.

      • insertOrUpdateDocumentImage

        public void insertOrUpdateDocumentImage(SECMDocumentImage documentImage)
        Insert a new image in the document. If it already exist, the image will be update.
        Parameters:
        documentImage -

      • saveOriginalImage

        public java.lang.String saveOriginalImage(Bitmap bitmap,
                                          java.lang.String name)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Save the given bitmap as original image in internal storage. In this operation, the image is not inserted in the document yet.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap to be saved
        name - The name of the file to save
        Returns:
        The path of the image file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Save the given bitmap as dewarped image in internal storage. In this operation, the image is not inserted in the document yet.
        Parameters:

        name - The name of the file to save
        Returns:

      • updateImage

        public boolean updateImage(Bitmap bmp,
                           java.lang.String path)
        Update the image file placed in the given path with the given bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bmp - The new bitmap to save
        path - The path of the current image file to be updated
        Returns:
        True if the image was updated. Otherwise, false;
